attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: A new online academic conference called Agents4Science is set to take place in October, focusing on various scientific fields with the goal of expanding interdisciplinary collaboration.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: Google has published a technical report that reveals the energy consumption of its Gemini applications, highlighting that the median energy usage for AI prompts represents an important metric for evaluating sustainability.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: OpenAI's CEO, Sam Altman, raises important questions regarding the appropriate manner in which AI should interact with users following the challenging launch of GPT-5, prompting discussions about user experience.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: Research from the past reveals significant contributions from psychologist B.F. Skinner, whose World War II projects with pigeons laid the groundwork for AI advances, indicating the historical importance of behavioral studies.
